Question.Subject: How can i get Weed in Auckland?
Question.Content: Can ssome oone please tell me where i can buy some weed in auckland. Give me an address or something please idk. Getting real frustrated now aye. Thanks

ChosenAnswer: You've already asked this. Anyone who looks like a druggy or dodgy.

Answers.Answer: Why would someone post the location of a dealer in a public place? You're an idiot.
Drop by my house, I can get you some real cheap.
